articles.title: US Citizen to Be Indicted for Trial
articles.content:
US Citizen to Be Indicted for Trial
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- The organ concerned of the DPRK decided to indict for trial Aijalon Mahli Gomes, male U.S. citizen, born on June 19, 1979 and residing in Boston, Massachusetts State, who illegally entered the country as his crime has been confirmed.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Pakistani President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Pakistani President
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Monday sent a message of greetings to Asif Ali Zardari, president of Pakistan, on the occasion of the day of Pakistan, the national holiday of the Pakistani people.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the DPRK and Pakistan would grow stronger in the future, the message wished the president and people of Pakistan greater successes in their work for the stability and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Choe Thae Bok Meets Cambodian Delegation
articles.content:
Choe Thae Bok Meets Cambodian Delegation
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- Choe Thae Bok, chairman of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with the delegation of the Cambodia-DPRK Friendship Parliamentary Group led by Chairman Som Chen, member of the National Assembly of Cambodia, when it paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.

articles.title: Gift from Cambodian Party Members
articles.content:
Gift from Cambodian Party Members
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift in the joint name of Prime Minister of Cambodia Hun Sen President of the Senate Chea Sim and President of the National Assembly Heng Samlin who are members of the leadership of the Central Committee of the People's Party of Cambodia.
					 The gift was handed to Chairman of the Supreme People's Assembly Choe Thae Bok who is secretary of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea by visiting Som Chen, chairman of the Cambodia-DPRK Friendship Parliamentary Group, on Monday.

articles.title: Italian Foreign Ministry Delegation Here
articles.content:
Italian Foreign Ministry Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of Italy headed by its Director General for the Asia and Oceania Attilio Massimo Iannucci arrived here Monday by air.

articles.title: Day of Pakistan Marked
articles.content:
Day of Pakistan Marked
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- A meeting took place at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Corps Club on Monday to mark the day of Pakistan.
					 Present there on invitation were Ambassador Arif Mahmood and staff members of the Pakistani embassy here.
					
					 Jon Yong Jin, vice-chairman of the Korean Committee for Cultural Relations with Foreign Countries, and officials concerned and working people in the city of Pyongyang were on hand.
					
					 Jon said at the meeting that President Kim Il Sung laid a solid foundation for the friendly relations between the two countries through historic meetings with leaders of Pakistan.
					
					 He declared that the DPRK would develop the relations with Pakistan in the future, too.
					
					The Pakistani ambassador noted that the DPRK is a country with the great people, expressing the belief that the Korean people would achieve greater advance under the leadership of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 At the end of the meeting, the participants enjoyed an art performance of schoolchildren.

articles.title: World Water Day Marked
articles.content:
World Water Day Marked
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- A function was held in Mundok County, South Phyongan Province, the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on March 22, the World Water Day.
					 Present at the function were officials of the Red Cross Society of the DPRK, town management officials of the county and members of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies resident in the DPRK.
					
					 After being briefed on the water supply facilities built in the township farm with the help of the federation, the participants looked round them.
					
					 They then went to the waterworks construction site in a new village of the township of Mundok County and gave a helping hand to the builders.

articles.title: Academic Degrees Awarded to Overseas Compatriots
articles.content:
Academic Degrees Awarded to Overseas Compatriots
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- The DPRK doctorate of history was conferred on Ri Yong Su, dean of the Faculty of Literature and History at Joson University under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), with due ceremony at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.
					 Ri Yong Su has made contribution to systematizing in an integrated whole the theoretical and practical problems arising in applying the great Juche idea, the Songun idea to the movement of Koreans in Japan to strengthen Chongryon.

articles.title: Health Complexes Well-off in DPRK
articles.content:
Health Complexes Well-off in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- Thirty years has passed since the Changgwang Health Complex (CHC) was constructed on the bank of the picturesque Pothong River in Pyongyang.
					 The well-equipped health center, opened on March 21, Juche 69 (1980) as a monumental edifice of the era of the Workers' Party of Korea, has a total floor space of some 38,000 square meters. It renders such services as bath, swimming, wading, haircut and beauty treatment, consuming thousands of tons of clean water on a daily average.
					
					 More than 55 million people have enjoyed its services over the past three decades.
					
					 After the appearance of CHC, many service centers modeled on it were built in the capital and each province, city and county, industrial establishments and rural communities. Some of them have been rebuilt on an expansion basis in the new century.
					
					 The facilities, called Undok Health Complex or Unjong Health Complex, are always full of people. 
					
					 Even in the period of "Arduous March", forced march, they were operated without interruption.

articles.title: President's Feats in Abolition of Tax System
articles.content:
President's Feats in Abolition of Tax System
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- The long-cherished desire of humankind to live in a taxless country was realized in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea for the first time.
					 During the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle President Kim Il Sung put forward a revolutionary and popular principle of taxation in "The Ten-point Programme of the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland" and wisely led the effort to introduce it in the guerrilla bases.
					
					 After the liberation of the country, he replaced the depredatory tax system applied by the Japanese imperialists with a popular and democratic one and took measures to systematically reduce taxes along with the foundations of the self-supporting national economy being built up in the country.
					
					 In Juche 44 (1955) the Republic lowered the blue and white collar workers' income tax 30 percent and radically reduced taxes of handicraftsmen, businessmen and merchants. It also brought down the peasants' tax in kind at 20.1 percent on an average from 25 percent of the yield, and again at 8.4 percent since 1959.
					
					 With the production relationship transformed on socialist lines and solid foundations of socialist industrialization laid, it pushed ahead with preparations for the abolition of the tax system and eliminated agricultural tax in kind in 1966.
					
					 Thus only the income tax paid by the industrial and non-industrial workers and some amount of local taxes still remained in the DPRK.
					
					 The President had a historic law, "On Abolishing the Tax System," adopted at the third session of the 5th Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK convened in March 1974 to finally do away with the tax system in the country.

articles.title: Yaoyinggou Meeting Significant for Anti-Japanese Struggle
articles.content:
Yaoyinggou Meeting Significant for Anti-Japanese Struggle
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung held a meeting of military and political carders of the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA) in Yaoyinggou, Wangqing County in the latter part of March Juche 24 (1935) and put forward a strategic policy of relinquishing the guerrilla zones and launching out the army units into wider areas.
					 The situation of the revolution was very rigorous at that time.
					
					 Owing to the cunning trick of the Japanese imperialists to split and disorganize the revolutionary ranks from within and rash acts of the left chauvinists, factionalists and flunkeyists, the guerrilla zones were suffering from a radical campaign to purge the "Minsaengdan."
					
					 What was worse, the Japanese imperialists encircled ring upon ring the guerrilla zones with huge elite troops and tenaciously resorted to a "punitive operation" for eliminating all the lives in the anti-Japanese guerrilla bases.
					
					 Such being the case, some people indiscreetly persisted in "defense of the guerrilla zones".
					
					 Their position was as foolish as waiting for death.
					
					 The President made a clear-cut analysis of the situation at the meeting and set forth detailed tasks for implementing the afore-said policy to bridge over the severe crisis and effect a new upsurge in the anti-Japanese revolution.
					
					 The justness of the Yaoyinggou meeting was clearly proved through the ensuing development of the anti-Japanese national liberation struggle as a whole.
					
					 After the voluntary dissolution of the guerrilla zones, the KPRA started large and small unit activities in south and north Manchuria and northern part of Korea to overshadow the enemy's numerical and technical superiorities.
					
					 During the activities, the KPRA grew larger and stronger rapidly, the advance of small units and political operatives into the homeland became frequent and the flames of the revolution spread over wider regions.
					
					 The President wrote in his reminiscences "With the Century" that the Yaoyinggou meeting marked a turning-point for the people's revolutionary army to switch over from strategic defense of the guerrilla zones to a new stage of strategic offensive.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK War Exercises Assailed
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK War Exercises Assailed
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- The frequent anti-DPRK war exercises in south Korea are a blatant challenge to the cause of the Korean nation for peace and a main factor of escalating the military tension on the Korean Peninsula, says Rodong Sinmun Monday in a signed article.
					 The Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises staged by the U.S. and the south Korean puppet warmongers are, in fact, an extension of their moves for igniting a war of aggression against the DPRK, the article notes, and goes on:
					
					 What the U.S. and the south Korean bellicose forces seek is a war of aggression against the DPRK, not peace and reunification of the Korean Peninsula. They are set to stoop to any infamy to impose disaster of a nuclear war upon the Korean nation in a bid to attain their criminal aim.
					
					 It is impossible to create a peaceful environment on the Korean Peninsula nor is it possible for the Korean nation to get rid of the danger of a nuclear war unless the anti-DPRK war exercises rendering the military tension to the extremes are stopped in south Korea.
					
					 The DPRK has made every possible effort to improve the inter-Korean relations and achieve the peaceful reunification of the country. But the south Korean conservative authorities have responded to the good faith shown by the DPRK by kicking off the anti-DPRK war exercises in collusion with foreign aggression forces.
					
					 The traitorous clique of south Korea, dead-set against the peaceful reunification of the country, are making desperate efforts to achieve "unification of systems", a pipe dream, through a war. They are finding a way for achieving it in escalating the racket for DPRK-targeted war maneuvers in collusion with foreign forces.
					
					 Needless to say, there can be neither dialogue nor improved inter-Korean relations as long as provocative war exercises aimed at doing harm to the DPRK are going on in south Korea.
					
					 The escalated confrontation and war moves of traitors going against the trend of the June 15 era of reunification are bound to go bust in face of the unanimous denunciation and dynamic struggle of the whole nation, concludes the article.

articles.title: Increased Independence of National Economy Called for
articles.content:
Increased Independence of National Economy Called for
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- It is important for each country and nation to increase their economic independence at present. This is because the imperialists are creating an economic crisis at each crucial time to achieve their ulterior aim and monopoly businesses of the imperialist countries are getting craftier and more vicious in their moves to destroy the national economy of developing countries under the signboard of "globalizing" economy.
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says this in a signed article.
					
					 To build an independent national economy is the most just mode of economic construction that helps each country achieve its prosperity by developing its national economy, undeterred by any storm, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 One of the important requirements of each country for achieving economic independence is to train its native cadres and scientific and technological personnel and develop its own science and technology.
					
					 The countries desirous of economic self-support should believe in their people's strength and enlist it, make the most effective use of their own resources and technologies on the principle of self-reliance to overcome manifold difficulties and promote the building of self-supporting national economy and an independent new society.
					
					 It is an essential requirement for economic independence to boost the economic and technological cooperation and South-South cooperation among developing countries.
					
					 It is of weighty importance in increasing the economic independence and promoting the building of a new society for developing countries to expand and develop the economic and technological cooperation and exchange on the principle of collective self-reliance.
					
					 They should wage a dynamic struggle to put an end to the old international economic order and establish a new one by their concerted efforts.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Work Observed
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday dedicates an article to the 10th anniversary of the publication of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "On Intensifying Education in Revolutionary Traditions through Revolutionary Battle Sites and Revolutionary Sites".
					 The work, published in March Juche 89 (2000), elucidates the importance of the education in the revolutionary traditions and the principled issues arising in intensifying the education in them in the new century. 
					
					 The jointly signed article says that the revolutionary traditions of Mt. Paektu provided by President Kim Il Sung in the period of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle are the historic roots of the Workers' Party of Korea and the Korean revolution and the lifeline that provides a steady continuity to the revolution. 
					
					 The article goes on:
					
					 Mt. Paektu is the symbol of Kim Il Sung's nation and a sacred mountain of the Songun revolution. The Korean revolution finds its roots on Mt. Paektu and the spirit of the DPRK is the revolutionary spirit of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					 The single-minded unity, mainstay of our revolution, the great Songun politics and the honor of our country and people dignified with the Juche idea are all linked with Mt. Paektu.
					
					 It is impossible to make the long journey of the Songun revolution without knowing Mt. Paektu associated with the revolutionary history of the President and the noble souls of the revolutionary martyrs and blood shed by them.
					
					 Referring to the leadership exploits of Kim Jong Il who glorified the revolutionary traditions of Mt. Paektu as the eternal cornerstone of the Korean revolution, the article stresses that the area of Mt. Paektu spruced up as the vast site for education in the revolutionary traditions in the new century is the noble fruition of the revolutionary faith and will of Kim Jong Il as well as his outstanding and tested leadership.
					
					 The strong mental power of Kim Il Sung's nation being displayed in the building of a great prosperous and powerful nation originated from the revolutionary traditions of Mt. Paektu and these traditions are the eternal treasure that firmly guarantees a bright future of the Korean revolution, it says.
					
					 No matter how desperately the U.S. and other imperialists may persist in their vicious moves for psychological warfare and the bourgeois ideological and cultural poisoning to benumb the revolutionary consciousness of the Korean people, they can never shake the faith of the Korean people firmly armed with the revolutionary traditions of Mt. Paektu, concludes the article.

articles.title: 14th Seminar of Parties on Building Society Held in Mexico
articles.content:
14th Seminar of Parties on Building Society Held in Mexico
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- The 14th seminar of world political parties on building a new society took place in Mexico from March 11 to 13.
					 Attending the seminar were delegations and delegates of more than 100 political parties and organizations from over 40 countries including the DPRK, China, Cuba, Vietnam, Venezuela, Nicaragua, Brazil and El Salvador and members of the leadership of the Workers' Party of Mexico and its party members.
					
					 A congratulatory message sent by the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea to the seminar was read out there. It was followed by congratulatory speeches made by the coordinator of the Broad Progressive Front of Mexico, the general secretary of the Democratic Revolutionary Party of Mexico and the chairman of the Party for Unity of Mexico. 
					
					 Alberto Anaya Gutierrez, coordinator of the National Coordinating Committee of the Workers' Party of Mexico, in an opening address said that the DPRK has become a military power with powerful nuclear deterrent thanks to the Songun politics.
					
					 Delegates of political parties and organizations of different countries in their speeches noted with high appreciation that the WPK and the people of the DPRK have firmly defended the dignity, sovereignty and the socialist cause under the uplifted banner of Songun to cope with the U.S. offensive to stifle the DPRK, expressing support and solidarity with the Korean people in their struggle to build a great prosperous and powerful nation and reunify the country. 
					
					 The seminar adopted a joint statement in support of the WPK and the Korean people in their struggle to build a thriving socialist nation and reunify the country. The joint statement warmly congratulated the DPRK on having successfully launched the satellite Kwangmyongsong-2 and successfully carried out the second nuclear test with its own efforts and by its own technology to emerge a proud country that launched satellites and had access to nuclear weapons. 
					
					 The statement supported the statement of the DPRK Foreign Ministry which proposed to the parties to the Armistice Agreement an early start of the talks to replace the AA with a peace treaty this year marking six decades since the outbreak of the Korean war.  
					
					 The coordinator of the National Coordinating Committee of the Workers' Party of Mexico presented a letter on the successful holding of the seminar to General Secretary Kim Jong Il on behalf of the participants in the seminar. 
					
					 The letter said that Kim Jong Il not only turned the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power but resolutely smashed the imperialists' moves to stifle the DPRK and honorably defended Korean-style socialism by pursuing the invincible Songun politics. This instilled the faith and optimism about the victory into the progressive political parties aspiring after socialism, the letter added. 
					
					 It highly praised Kim Jong Il for having made immortal contributions to the accomplishment of global independence and the socialist cause.

articles.title: DPRK' Proposal for Conclusion of Peace Treaty Supported
articles.content:
DPRK' Proposal for Conclusion of Peace Treaty Supported
 Pyongyang, March 22 (KCNA) -- Ibrahim Eisam Lary, general-secretary of the Arab Lawyers Union, issued a statement on March 16 in support of the proposal of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea on replacing the Armistice Agreement with a peace treaty. 
					 The statement said:
					
					 It is 60 years since the United States provoked the war of aggression against the DPRK after occupying half of the Korean Peninsula in the mid-1940s. 
					
					 In the past 60 years the U.S. has committed ceaseless armed provocations against the DPRK and escalated political and economic pressure on it. 
					
					 It is the unanimous wish and desire of all the Korean people to achieve the reunification of the country and it is an issue of worldwide concern. 
					
					 It is a precondition for achieving the reunification of Korea to replace the AA with a peace treaty and get the U.S. forces withdrawn from south Korea.
					
					 We Arab lawyers hold that the Korean Peninsula should be reunified on the basis of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration and the October 4 declaration as desired by all the Korean people and the world peace-loving people and extend full support to the DPRK's proposal, the statement stressed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il envia mensaje de felicitacion a Choummaly Saynasone
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il envia mensaje de felicitacion a Choummaly Saynasone
Pyongyang, 22 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, envio el dia 21 un mensaje de felicitacion al secretario general del Comite Central del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao, Choummaly Saynasone, con motivo del 55o aniversario de la fundacion de esta agrupacion politica laosiana. 
					La misiva va como sigue:
					
					Con motivo del 55o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido Popular Revolucionario Lao, envio mis calurosas felicitaciones a Vd. y por su conducto, al Comite Central del PPRL y todos los militantes de su partido. 
					
					A lo largo de los 55 anos pasados que datan de su fundacion, el PPRL ha venido organizando y dirigiendo a la victoria la lucha del pueblo lao por consolidar la independencia del pais y construir una nueva sociedad prospera. 
					
					Hoy dia, el pueblo lao desarrolla con energia la lucha por materializar la resolucion del 8o Congreso del Partido bajo la correcta guia del PPRL encabezado por Vd, mediante lo cual alcanza grandes exitos en la defensa de la patria y en la construccion economica.
					
					Aprovecho esta oportunidad para expresarle mi conviccion de que en adelante tambien las tradicionales relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre nuestros dos partidos y dos paises seguiran desarrollandose favorablemente y formulo votos por mayores exitos en su labor responsable por el fortalecimiento del partido y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun denuncia ejercicios belicos para agredir a la RPDC
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun denuncia ejercicios belicos para agredir a la RPDC
Pyongyang, 22 de marzo (ATCC) -- Los ejercicios de guerra de agresion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, que se efectuan con frecuencia en el Sur de Corea, devienen el desafio perverso a la causa pacifica de la nacion coreana y el factor principal que agrava la tension militar de la Peninsula Coreana.
					 En un articulo individual de este lunes el diario Rodong Sinmun califica los ejercicios militares conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" librados por EE.UU. y los belicistas titeres surcoreanos de la continuacion de sus maniobras tendentes a desatar la guerra de agresion a la RPDC y prosigue:
					
					 EE.UU. y las fuerzas belicistas del Sur de Corea persiguen no la paz ni la reunificacion de la Peninsula Coreana sino la guerra de agresion a la RPDC.
					
					 Para realizar su objetivo criminal tratan de imponer sin titubeo la calamidad de guerra nuclear a la nacion coreana.
					
					 Mientras no se interrumpen en el Sur de Corea los ejercicios de guerra de agresion a la RPDC que agravan al maximo la tension militar, es imposible crearse las circunstancias pacificas en la Peninsula Coreana, y la nacion coreana no puede liberarse del peligro de la guerra nuclear.
					
					 La RPDC ha hecho todos esfuerzos posibles por la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas y la reunificacion pacifica del pais.
					
					 Pero, las autoridades conservadoras surcoreanas respondieron con los ejercicios belicos para agredir a la RPDC a la buena voluntad de esta en conspiracion con las fuerzas extranjeras agresivas.
					
					 La banda traidora actua desesperadamente por realizar el sueno de la "reunificacion institucional‚Äù basada en la provocacion de guerra negando la reunificacion pacifica del pais y busca su medio en fortalecer mas la campana de los ejercicios arriba mencionados con las fuerzas foraneas.
					
					 Puesto que siga el alboroto en cuestion tendente a perjudicar a la RPDC en el Sur de Corea, son imposibles sin duda alguna, la reanudacion de dialogo y la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas.
					
					 Las maquinaciones de confrontacion y guerra de los traidores que nadan contra la corriente de la epoca de la reunificacion del 15 de Junio no evitaran el fracaso por la denuncia unanime y la lucha firme de todos los coreanos.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun llama a la independencia economica
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun llama a la independencia economica
Pyongyang, 22 de marzo (ATCC) -- En la epoca actual, resulta importante el afianzamiento de la independencia economica de cada pais y nacion, puesto que se desatan en momentos cruciales las crisis economicas manipuladas por los imperialistas y se tornan mas siniestras y brutales las acciones de los monopolios de los paises imperialistas con miras a arruinar la economia nacional de los paises en vias de desarrollo.
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este lunes y continua:
					
					La construccion de la economia nacional independiente es el mas justo metodo de construccion economica que permite lograr la prosperidad del pais desarrollando la economia nacional de modo que esta no se vea afectada ante cualesquier vientos y mareas.
					
					Lo mas importante de ello es formar a los cuadros nacionales y los cientificos y tecnicos talentosos y desarrollar la ciencia y la tecnologia nacionales.
					
					Los paises aspirantes a la autarquia deben superar todas las pruebas y dificultades con las fuerzas propias de sus pueblos y movilizando con mayor eficiencia sus recursos y tecnologias en el principio de autoconfianza, y promover la construccion de la economia nacional autarquica y de la nueva sociedad independiente.
					
					Fortalecer y desarrollar en el principio de autoconfianza colectiva la cooperacion y el intercambio en la rama economico-tecnica y la cooperacion Sur-Sur entre los paises en vias de desarrollo constituyen la condicion sine qua non de la independencia economica y la cuestion muy importante para acelerar la construccion de la nueva sociedad.
					
					Ellos deben luchar energicamente y con las fuerzas unidas por establecer el nuevo orden economico internacional.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun elogia las tradiciones revolucionarias del Paektu
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun elogia las tradiciones revolucionarias del Paektu
Pyongyang, 22 de marzo (ATCC) -- En ocasion del X aniversario de la publicacion de la obra del Dirigente Kim Jong Il "Para fortalecer la educacion en las tradiciones revolucionarias mediante los campos de batalla revolucionaria y los lugares de interes historico-revolucionario" el periodico Rodong Sinmun inserto un articulo a nombre comun que senala:
					 En esta obra publicada en marzo del 89 (2000) de la Era Juche estan aclarados claramente la importancia de la educacion en las tradiciones revolucionarias  en el nuevo siglo y los problemas de principios por el particular.
					
					  Las tradiciones revolucionarias del Paektu creadas por el Presidente Kim Il Sung en el periodo de la lucha de la revolucion antijaponesa devienen la raiz historica del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y la revolucion coreana y el linaje para hacer la revolucion de generacion en generacion.
					
					 El monte Paektu es el simbolo de Corea de       Kim Il Sung y monte sagrado de la revolucion del Songun (priorizacion militar).
					
					 La revolucion coreana se arraiga en ese monte y el espiritu de Corea es el revolucionario del Paektu.  
					
					 Este monte esta relacionado con la unidad monolitica que es lo mas importante de la revolucion coreana, la gran politica de Songun y el honor de la patria y el pueblo coreano que se destacan con Juche.
					
					 No podran recorrer hasta el fin el camino de la revolucion del Songun sin conocer el monte Paektu en que esta sintetizada la historia revolucionaria del Presidente y estan impregnados el noble espiritu y la sangre de los martires revolucionarios.
					
					 El Dirigente consolido las tradiciones revolucionarias en cuestion como piedra angular eterna de la revolucion coreana.
					
					 La region del monte Paektu fue preparada excelentemente como un gran centro para la educacion en las tradiciones revolucionarias en el nuevo siglo. Esto se debe a la conviccion y voluntad revolucionarias y la destacada y probada direccion del Dirigente.
					
					 Las  tradiciones en cuestion sirven de la base del poderio espiritual de la nacion de Kim Il Sung que se despliega ahora en la construccion de la gran potencia prospera socialista y son los bienes eternos que garantizan firmemente el radiante futuro de la revolucion coreana.
					
					 Por muy perversas que sean la operacion psicologica y las maniobras de penetracion de ideologia y cultura burguesas de EE.UU. y otros imperialistas encaminadas a paralizar la conciencia revolucionaria del pueblo coreano no podran eliminar jamas la conviccion del pueblo coreano armado estrictamente con las tradiciones revolucionarias del monte Paektu.
